S.FORM: Minsiong Minsiong (Paywan binacadan a kamu: Balai, nalecuhan i 1970 a mihcaan 6 a bulad 9 a demiad). Taywan mudadiway, mipalaway, namakay i Pingtung sian Sici siang Silu niyazu', u Paywan binacadan a tademaw. naayaway a ngangan: ci Lee minsiong. malimula' a ngangan ci Minsiong ke. kanatal: Conghuaminko. binacadan: Paywan. nalecu i Taywan Pingtung sian Sici siang. nalecuhan i 1970 a mihcaan 6 a bulad 9 a demiad. kawaw niza: mudadiway, mipalaway, mitelungay, misanga' tu dadiw. misanga' tu palaw. matinengay a kamu: Hulam, Paywan, Taywan. pahezek a cacudadan: Pingtung kawkung. nalimaan: kalimucu' sakapitu . siwkay niza Minsiong i kawcung henay sa, mudadiwtu i Pingtung, Kaosiung. sisa, matinengtu katuuday ku mipalaway a tademaw. nalimaan nu dadiw pulungan a nalimaan: mududu' tu bulad (1999 a mihcaan palekal) teked a nalimaan: maazih tu cilal (2001 a mihcaan)(aci wanposen,Lincyayi,Coyun pulung mudadiw) teked a nalimaan: sicedamay a luma' (2008 a mihcaan) adidi'ay a nalimaan: Less and More (2012 a mihcaan palekal) iga 2008 a mihcaan kalimucu' sakapitu (mipalaw ci Malaw) 2012 a mihcaan pakuyucay a tademaw 2017 a mihcaan 52 Hz I Love You tilibi Taywan tilibi(2001 a mihcaan) u ngangan aku ci Lianhua ( , ) Yincumincu tilibi(2005 a mihcaan) miadupay( , ) Yincumincu tilibi(2009 a mihcaan) misaydan i Lanyu Binawlan tilibi(2009 a mihcaan) kakasenengan Manamuh tilibi(2010 a mihcaan) muwa atu kilang Taywan tilibi(2011 a mihcaan) kakasenengan i umah Manamuh tilibi(2012 a mihcaan) buyu RXAY Sanli tilibi(2013 a mihcaan) maymaw takuwanan Sanli tilibi(2014 a mihcaan) limulak tilibi(2015 a mihcaan) PMAM Tademaw tilibi(2015 a mihcaan) Taywan tilibi(2016 a mihcaan) Taywan tilibi(2016 a mihcaan) (2016 )( F ) nalimaan nu mitelungay misalukyaw ku Tuas kapah tu Taywan palud ni ina tansul sa singangan tuway nuayaway a simpi cacekulan u zuma ku kapah nu palaw 5 9
